content: You will next receive a multiple-choice question, each with five options: A, B, C, D, and E respectively. Please provide your answer as a single letter option (your response should contain only one letter as the answer and no other text).

Question: At a shop what can you buy to put your spare unused things?
Options: A. basement B. cardboard box C. ocean floor D. high school E. container

Option B is correct. A cardboard box is a suitable container to store spare items in a shop. It is cheap, lightweight and can be easily found in most shops. Basement, ocean floor and high school are not related to the question and do not provide a suitable solution.

Question: At a shop what can you buy to put your spare unused things?
Options: E. container D. high school C. ocean floor B. cardboard box A. basement

When choosing the best option to put your spare items in a shop, it depends on what type of items you are selling. High school, ocean floor and basement are not commonly used or available places for selling items, so they are not valid options. On the other hand, cardboard boxes are cheap, lightweight and suitable for storing a variety of items, especially those that need to be protected from weather or other elements. Additionally, cardboard boxes can easily be found in most shops, making them a convenient option for purchasing them. Therefore, the best option is B. Cardboard box.
